error.message: Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to username_validation.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
Parse error in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should be valid. See https://drupal.org/node/2514612.
